last_episode_to_air.name: This Could Be Dangerous
last_episode_to_air.overview: Cheryl pursues a stolen car; Yvette encounters an intoxicated driver; an overdose victim thanks Tracy; Angela investigates a violent robbery.

name: Police Women of Dallas
overview: Police Women of Dallas is the fourth installment of TLC's Police Women reality documentary series, which follows three police officers and a detective of the Dallas Police Department in Dallas, Texas. Despite not being renewed by TLC, the Oprah Winfrey Network ordered a second season which features three new cast members.

episodes.name: Don't Make Me Tase You
episodes.overview: Melissa nabs a robbery suspect at the scene; Tracy draws her taser in a standoff against a defiant man; Mia & Sara pepper-spray an uncooperative suspect; Beth discovers narcotics, and whole lot more, on suspected drug dealers.

episodes.name: I'm Putting Everybody in Cuffs
episodes.overview: Tracy finds herself alone in the middle of an all out neighborhood brawl. Melissa chases down a man accused of choking his girlfriend. Mia & Sara give a life lesson to an at-risk youth. Beth narrowly dodges a collision with a suspicious driver.

episodes.name: Kick Me Again, See What Happens
episodes.overview: Tracy takes down a belligerent drunk woman; Mia and Sara get a mouthful from a man with warrants; Melissa races to a disturbance involving a man with a loaded rifle; Beth tries to scare a young prostitute straight.

episodes.name: He Bleedin'
episodes.overview: Tracy arrests a man for allegedly attempting to stab his stepbrother; Mia and Sara break up a drunken fight between two women; Melissa discovers a stolen car at a suspected "chop shop".

episodes.name: A Fool For Love
episodes.overview: Tracy responds to a drug deal gone wrong; Mia and Sara arrest a Casanova; Melissa stops a woman from taking a walk shirtless; Beth pursues burglary suspects.

episodes.name: This Ain't Pretty Woman
episodes.overview: Melissa kicks down a door while responding to a shots fired call; Tracy rolls up on a group of street gamblers and recognizes a familiar face; Mia and Sara take down a burglary suspect; Beth cuffs a suspicious character wanted on a warrant for assault.

episodes.name: Pull Up Your Pants
episodes.overview: Mia and Sara find a suspect that has hidden drugs in a disturbing place; Melissa responds to a man claiming his knife-wielding cousin is threatening him; Beth finds a man preparing to shoot heroin; Tracy busts a youth whose foolishness may cost him.

episodes.name: You're Killing Me Dude
episodes.overview: Melissa responds to "shots fired" call in a residential neighborhood; Tracy has to play referee in a fight between an apartment security guard and a belligerent young woman; Beth stops a dope addict; And Mia and Sara intervene in a domestic disturbance.

episodes.name: Somebody Just Got Stabbed
episodes.overview: Yvette responds to a stabbing call; Tracy tends to a bickering couple; Cheryl helps with an imagined canine problem; Angela interrogates suspected carjackers.

episodes.name: Let's Go Fight Crime
episodes.overview: Yvette mediates a fight between a man and his three lovers; a woman tries to run her boyfriend down with a car; Angela hunts for an accused thief.

episodes.name: She's Got Warrants
episodes.overview: Yvette responds to a call about a woman threatened by her boyfriend; Tracy helps a woman who has been locked out; Angela investigates a robbery involving a trucker.

episodes.name: Hooks and Crooks
episodes.overview: Tracy must pull her weapon during a dangerous confrontation; Angela investigates a home invasion; a brawl at a barber college; Yvette deals with a cross-dressing prostitute.

episodes.name: He Hit Me First!
episodes.overview: An intoxicated man jumps into the front seat of Yvette's car; Tracy responds to a carjacking; Angela investigates a suspected kidnapping; Cheryl has a run-in with a man and his horse.

episodes.name: A Pretty Good Little Fight
episodes.overview: Cheryl is forced to draw her gun; Yvette handles a hostile suspect; Angela investigates an armed robber; Tracy faces her fear of dogs.

episodes.name: A Good Situation to Get Shot
episodes.overview: Yvette races to a report of a man with a gun; Tracy answers a call about a threatening landlord; Cheryl encounters a car accident; Angela investigates an assault and a robbery.

episodes.name: Any Sudden Movements, You'll Be Shot
episodes.overview: Cheryl searches for a burglary suspect; Tracy's suspect may be a counterfeiter; Yvette sorts out a domestic dispute; Angela investigates an armed robbery.

episodes.name: He Just Started Shooting
episodes.overview: Tracy races to the scene of a shooting; Angela investigates an aggravated robbery; Yvette uncovers a drug stash; Cheryl intervenes during a domestic fight.

episodes.name: There's Blood Everywhere
episodes.overview: Yvette responds to a home robbery in progress; Tracy must calm a naked man; Cheryl attends a self-inflicted stabbing; Angela investigates an aggravated robbery.

episodes.name: So...You Ready to Die?
episodes.overview: Tracy responds to a call about a woman with a butcher knife; Yvette must draw her gun at a burglary; Cheryl tries to help a troubled teen; Angela interrogates a carjacking suspect.

episodes.name: She's Unleashed
episodes.overview: Tracy evacuates residents during a gas leak; Cheryl handles a man accused of urinating on a tattoo shop; Yvette joins a drug task force operation; Angela investigates a convenience store robbery.

episodes.name: This Could Be Dangerous
episodes.overview: Cheryl pursues a stolen car; Yvette encounters an intoxicated driver; an overdose victim thanks Tracy; Angela investigates a violent robbery.
